DATKit.utils.image_utils module

DATKit.utils.image_utils.convert_svg_to_png(svg_path)[source]

Converts an SVG file to PNG using cairosvg.

Parameters:

svg_path (str) – Path to the SVG file.

Returns:

png_path – Path to the generated PNG file.

Return type:

str

DATKit.utils.interpolation_utils module

DATKit.utils.interpolation_utils.nearest(kDa, values, **kwargs)[source]

Create a function for extrapolation that assigns the nearest available value from the input data.

Parameters:

  • kDa (array-like) – Array of known kDa values from the original dataset.

  • values (array-like) – Array of corresponding values to the kDa values.

  • **kwargs (dict) – Additional keyword arguments (not used, included for compatibility).

Returns:

A function that takes an array x as input and returns an array of values corresponding to the nearest kDa value for each point in x.

Return type:

callable

Notes

  • The function uses the absolute difference between each value in x and the known kDa values to determine the nearest value.

  • If x contains values outside the range of kDa, the nearest edge value in kDa will be assigned.

DATKit.utils.interpolation_utils.zeros(*args, **kwargs)[source]

Create a function for extrapolation that assigns a value of zero outside the range.

Parameters:

  • *args (tuple) – Additional positional arguments (not used, included for compatibility).

  • **kwargs (dict) – Additional keyword arguments (not used, included for compatibility).

Returns:

A function that takes an array x as input and returns an array of zeros with the same shape as x.

Return type:

callable
